>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<

>>===== OPTIONS =====>>
{
    "static_statute_locator":false,
    "clobber_locator_if_no_statute_section":false,
    "handle_parallel_articles":false,
    "rtl_support":false
}
<<===== OPTIONS =====<<


>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry">BBC News</div>
  <div class="csl-entry">Doe, J.</div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
harvard-leeds-metropolitan-university.csl
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "author": [
            {
                "family": "Doe", 
                "given": "John"
            }
        ], 
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "type": "book"
    },
    {
        "author": [
            {
                "family": "BBC News",
                "given":""
            }
        ], 
        "id": "ITEM-2", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
